```{r}
library(RMySQL)
critique <- dbConnect(RMySQL::MySQL(), user = 'root', password = 'celeborn', db = 'MovieRating', host = 'localhost', port =3306)
dbListTables(critique)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
movierating <- dbGetQuery(critique, "select moviename, adam, bert, chris, rhoda, di from movieratings")
summary(movierating)
ggplot(movierating)

```
